analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Nasavitakkasavicāraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca savitakkasavicāro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa vitakka sa vicāram na hetum dhammam paṭicca sa vitakka sa vicāraḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā pannarasa, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā cuddasa …pe… purejāte āsevane cuddasa …pe… avigate pannarasa.
analyzed: hetuyā pannarasa ārammaṇe pannarasa adhipatiyā cuddasa pe purejāte āsevane cuddasa pe avigate pannarasa

original: Napītisahagataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca pītisahagato hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na pīti sahagatam na hetum dhammam paṭicca pīti sahagataḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Nadassanena pahātabbaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabbam na hetum dhammam paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nadassanena pahātabbahetukaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na dassanena pahātabba hetukam na hetum dhammam paṭicca bhāvanāya pahātabba hetukaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cuddasa, adhipatiyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cuddasa.
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cuddasa adhipatiyā nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate cuddasa

original: Naācayagāmiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca apacayagāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na ācaya gāmim na hetum dhammam paṭicca apacaya gāmī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava

original: Nasekkhaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca asekkho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sekkham na hetum dhammam paṭicca asekkhaḥ hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
analyzed: hetuyā nava pe āsevane cha pe avigate nava
